qas.question: To what areas has Melbourne dedicated substantial international investment?
In what areas has major inner-city urban renewal occurred?

answers.text: Southbank, Port Melbourne, Melbourne Docklands and more recently, South Wharf

qas.question: Melbourne has sustained the highest population increase and economic growth rate in any Australian city according to what organization?
How many years did Melbourne sustain the highest population increase and economic growth?

context: Since the mid-1990s, Melbourne has maintained significant population and employment growth. There has been substantial international investment in the city's <a0_0>industries and property market<a0_0/>. Major inner-city urban renewal has occurred in areas such as <a1_0>Southbank, Port Melbourne, Melbourne Docklands and more recently, South Wharf<a1_0/>. According to the <a2_0>Australian Bureau of Statistics<a2_0/>, Melbourne sustained the highest population increase and economic growth rate of any Australian capital city in the <a3_0>three<a3_0/> years ended June 2004. These factors have led to population growth and further suburban expansion through the 2000s.
